text:
Bill Nation (born 1925) is an American politician for the Democratic Party. He served as the 45th and 50th mayor of Cheyenne, Wyoming, from 1962 to 1966 and 1973 to 1977. He was a member of the Wyoming House of Representatives from Laramie County between 1965 and 1967.
Nation was born in Lingle, Wyoming. He is married to Jo Ann Petersen and has four children.
